column4: quick question | any programs for ubuntu that can do ext4 partitions?
Gparted has no ext4 there? Any ideas!
you need updated packages from jaunty. e2fsprogs at least 1.41 and new gparted
but then im not sure how its going to behave stability wise
How can I do that ? Sorry for the Newb queston.
or compile them from source. without installing
try going to jaunty repo and downloading them
but i strongly not recommend it, recompile them from source if you want to do it the proper way, dont ask for support if it breaks
i mean you can ask, but ppl are probably gonna frown on that :)
just grab the latest versions from those two links i gave you
